definitions.definition: Tagged at the end of a sentence to convey a sense of resignation or inevitability .
Used to suggest that there is an obvious, inevitable or straightforward answer to something.
Suggests that the reply given is the obvious or expected one.
Used to reinforce an opinion, sometimes in a sarcastic manner.

main_definition: Tagged at the end of a sentence to convey a sense of resignation or inevitability .
secondary_definitions: Used to suggest that there is an obvious, inevitable or straightforward answer to something.
Suggests that the reply given is the obvious or expected one.
Used to reinforce an opinion, sometimes in a sarcastic manner.
